description: To make a pills navigation sticky, you need to wrap it in a layout that is position:fixed.  If the pills are at the top of the element that scrolls, the best way is to set a padding-top on the layout element that is the height of the pills nav.  Otherwise, you need to write some javascript to switch between position absolute and position fixed.  This is component code and not OTK code.
